snippet: In the battle over Utah’s ban on same-sex marriage, the state has changed tack multiple times, refining its argument for the Supreme Court to include the benefits of “gender diversity” in parenting.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column on Utah's opposition of same-sex marriage; holds that in its battle, state has changed tactics multiple times, refining its argument for Supreme Court to include benefits of 'gender diversity' in parenting.
lead_paragraph: In the battle over Utah’s ban on same-sex marriage, the state has changed tack multiple times, refining its argument for the Supreme Court to include the benefits of “gender diversity” in parenting.

headline.print_headline: Utah, in Opposing Gay Marriage, Finds Three Arguments Are Better Than One
headline.main: Utah, in Opposing Gay Marriage, Finds Three Arguments Are Better Than One

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
